item.name: Ambush Commander
item.text: Forests you control are 1/1 green Elf creatures that are still lands. {1}{G}, Sacrifice an Elf: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.name: Elemental
item.text: Trample

item.name: Allosaurus Rider
item.text: You may exile two green cards from your hand rather than pay Allosaurus Rider's mana cost. Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.

item.name: Elvish Eulogist
item.text: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.
item.flavorText: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."

item.name: Elvish Harbinger
item.text: When Elvish Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

item.name: Elvish Warrior
item.flavorText: "My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."

item.name: Gempalm Strider
item.text: Cycling {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Strider, Elf creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.name: Heedless One
item.text: Trample Heedless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Channel your vitality through me."

item.name: Imperious Perfect
item.text: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {G}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

item.name: Llanowar Elves
item.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. —Llanowar penalty for trespassing

item.name: Lys Alana Huntmaster
item.text: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

item.name: Stonewood Invoker
item.text: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The Mirari pulses in his veins.

item.name: Sylvan Messenger
item.text: Trample When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

item.name: Timberwatch Elf
item.text: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

item.name: Voice of the Woods
item.text: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Put a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.

item.name: Wellwisher
item.text: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."

item.name: Wirewood Herald
item.text: When Wirewood Herald is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: The goblins laughed as the elf ran away, until more came back.

item.name: Wirewood Symbiote
item.text: Return an Elf you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.
item.flavorText: It drinks fatigue.

item.name: Wood Elves
item.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

item.name: Wren's Run Vanquisher
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Wren's Run Vanquisher, reveal an Elf card from your hand or pay {3}. Deathtouch (Creatures dealt damage by this creature are destroyed. You can divide this creature's combat damage among any of the creatures blocking or blocked by it.)

item.name: Elvish Promenade
item.text: Put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield for each Elf you control.
item.flavorText: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.

item.name: Giant Growth
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.name: Harmonize
item.text: Draw three cards.
item.flavorText: "Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing." —Seton, centaur druid

item.name: Wildsize
item.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: Two times the size, four times the smell.

item.name: Moonglove Extract
item.text: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: Moonglove Extract deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

item.name: Slate of Ancestry
item.text: {4}, {T}, Discard your hand: Draw a card for each creature you control.
item.flavorText: The pattern of life can be studied like a book, if you know how to read it.

item.name: Wirewood Lodge
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {G}, {T}: Untap target Elf.

item.name: Tranquil Thicket
item.text: Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Siege-Gang Commander
item.text: When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield. {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Akki Coalflinger
item.text: First strike {R}, {T}: Attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: No matter where you find them, goblins love rocks.

item.name: Clickslither
item.text: Haste Sacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The least popular goblins get the outer caves.

item.name: Emberwilde Augur
item.text: Sacrifice Emberwilde Augur: Emberwilde Augur deals 3 damage to target player. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
item.flavorText: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

item.name: Flamewave Invoker
item.text: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: Inside even the humblest goblin lurks the potential for far greater things—and far worse.

item.name: Gempalm Incinerator
item.text: Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

item.name: Goblin Cohort
item.text: Goblin Cohort can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.
item.flavorText: Akki shells provided good protection when downhill charging became headlong tumbling.

item.name: Goblin Matron
item.text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: There's always room for one more.

item.name: Goblin Ringleader
item.text: Haste When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

item.name: Goblin Sledder
item.text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Let's play ‘sled.' Here's how it works: you're the sled."

item.name: Goblin Warchief
item.text: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblin creatures you control have haste.
item.flavorText: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

item.name: Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician
item.text: Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, sacrifice it. If you do, it deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it. Sacrifice two Mountains: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Everybody but me—CHARGE!"

item.name: Mogg Fanatic
item.text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "I got it! I got it! I—"

item.name: Mogg War Marshal
item.text: Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Mogg War Marshal enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
item.text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

item.name: Raging Goblin
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

item.name: Reckless One
item.text: Haste Reckless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Release chaos with me!"

item.name: Skirk Drill Sergeant
item.text: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
item.flavorText: "I order you to volunteer."

item.name: Skirk Fire Marshal
item.text: Protection from red Tap five untapped Goblins you control: Skirk Fire Marshal deals 10 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: He's boss because he's smart enough to get out of the way.

item.name: Skirk Prospector
item.text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die." —Braids, dementia summoner

item.name: Skirk Shaman
item.text: Skirk Shaman can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures.
item.flavorText: In a shaman's grimy hands, a concoction of dried Skirk Ridge herbs can become the face of panic.

item.name: Tar Pitcher
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "Auntie Grub had caught a goat, a bleating doe that still squirmed in her arms. At the same time, her warren decided to share with her a sensory greeting of hot tar . . . ." —A tale of Auntie Grub

item.name: Boggart Shenanigans
item.text: Whenever another Goblin you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have Boggart Shenanigans deal 1 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: Boggarts revel in discovering new sensations, from the texture of an otter pellet to the squeak of a dying warren mate.

item.name: Spitting Earth
item.text: Spitting Earth deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.
item.flavorText: "Within each of you is the strength of a landslide." —Kumano, to his pupils

item.name: Tarfire
item.text: Tarfire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious." —A tale of Auntie Grub

item.name: Forgotten Cave
item.text: Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Goblin Burrows
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}{R}, {T}: Target Goblin creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R
